title: pick ban colors
body:
pick ban colors should be obvious in champ select
you can do this in 2 main ways
#1 - make the blue team on left and red team on right from the players' perspective during draft
#2 - make the hover color (eg. before you lock in) the same as your side color (blue/red)

replies.body: Are they not obvious already? I'm unsure exactly what you mean, but the whole lobby goes red when ban phase is up, and blue for pick phase. Adding side based colours would probably confuse things more than help.
